page.title: 06LAW AND ORDER IN DYMCHURCH
page.content: There are two Policemen in Dymchurch. P.C.Firmen and P.C.Reene are responsible for the area from St. Mary's Bay to the Redoubt. They each have a family house provided in the area. They had to be 18 to join the Police Force. They went to Ashford Training Centre for ten weeks. In Dymchurch they share a silver and white motorbike and a dark blue Ford Escort car. The motorbike is fitted with a radio telephone. Each man has a CB radio which has a five mile radius. They also have a bleeper. If two P.C.'s are in a car they have to be dressed the same. P.C. Firmen has arrested about 200 people in Dymchurch over 6 years. Vandalism is the most common crime in Dymchurch.
